nodes.text: The Ootmian Pabol was a hyperlane within Hutt Space. The Delphanian privateer Sidon Ithano carried a letter of marque that gave him licence to conduct raids along the Ootmian Pabol, Pabol Hutta, Shag Pabol and all secular hyperlanes in Hutt Space. The letter also allowed him to deliver any seized cargoes from these raids to his patron Hutt kajidics, the Desilijic, Ramesh, Besadii, Gnuda and Shell.

The Ootmian Pabol was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon on a supplemental item included in the deluxe edition of the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Smuggler's Guide, which was written by Daniel Wallace.
